content: the bryn crochet blanket features the tunisian full stitch a stitch that creates incredible texture and a squishy-like feel perfect for snuggling under it combines two different yarns which give it a unique look unlike any other blanket whether you re sitting by the campfire snuggled up in your rv or simply using it at home curled up in front of the fire the bryn blanket is perfect for the occasion tunisian crochet skill level advanced beginner standard us terms this includes one printable crochet pattern + video + photo support **materials** - color a lion brand pound of love in vanilla 2 skeins 1 020 yards each - color b lion brand mandala in groot 3 cakes 590 yards each - 7mm tunisian crochet hook with long cable **techniques** - learn a new tunisian crochet stitch - learn how to change colors in tunisian crochet **measurements** - 48 1/2 wide x 60″ long
